verses.text: \w Arise|strong="H5782"\w*, \w arise|strong="H5782"\w*, \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, O Sion, \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w One|strong="H3808"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* henceforth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w* \w through|strong="H0935"\w* thee.

\w Shake|strong="H5287"\w* thyself \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w loose|strong="H6083"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w off|strong="H5287"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, O captive \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Sion.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w You|strong="H3588"\w* were \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* gratis, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w at|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* sojourn \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Assyrian hath \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w without|strong="H0657"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w cause|strong="H0657"\w* \w at|strong="H8033"\w* all.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* gratis. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w treat|strong="H5006"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* unjustly, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H5006"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w myself|strong="H0589"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w here|strong="H2005"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* beautiful \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* bringeth \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* preacheth \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* sheweth \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* preacheth \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* saith \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Sion: Thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*!

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* convert Sion.

\w Rejoice|strong="H7442"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5162"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w deserts|strong="H2723"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath prepared \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w*, \w depart|strong="H5493"\w*, \w go|strong="H3318"\w* ye \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* thence, \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w thing|strong="H3627"\w*: \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w*, \w be|strong="H0408"\w* ye clean, \w you|strong="H5375"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* tumult, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w haste|strong="H2649"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* flight: \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w my|strong="H5375"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w understand|strong="H7919"\w*, \w he|strong="H2009"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H7311"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w extolled|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H7311"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* visage \w be|strong="H0376"\w* inglorious \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w form|strong="H8389"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* sprinkle \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w shut|strong="H7092"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w have|strong="H0834"\w* beheld.
